cause.description:
Yes, people do hunt deer & that kind of stuff but that is legal but when it comes to cat, dog & that kind of animals that makes people discused, & that is what this world has come to saddy. so if you have one inch of heart in you then you will join this gruop for all of those cat & dogs ect. that did not survive because of the torcher that human beings gave to them.
1. therer are bout a million animals are abuse that need help now.
2. The animals abusers are sometimes found but sometime they are not.
3. We have to some how stop this wide spreading abuse.
cause.name: Stop the animal abuse
